## BigNumber.isInteger() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is an integer, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

```ts
x = new BigNumber(1)
x.isInteger()                   // true
y = new BigNumber(123.456)
y.isInteger()                   // false
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
isInteger(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean
